4 - The future of extreme poverty

How realistic is the goal of ending global extreme poverty by 2030?


The following visualization shows the historical decline in global extreme poverty rates, from 1981 to 2015, and adds a projection for 2030 assuming:
  1. that the average growth rates of consumption in all countries will be the same as the average growth rates from the past 10 years in each country.
  2. that the dispersion in the distribution of consumption in each country will remain unchanged.
